Text: I can't stand this Jeffrey Kuhner as a fill in host. Michael Savage would never put a listenable guest host on - he wants the guest host to be so annoying that it makes Savage look all the more good. That is why he attacks every other conservative host out there! He considers them the competition. Why not just run a "best of" show.
I agree, Jeff Coonair talks like a 1st grade teacher speaking to his class.  The way he stretches words agravates me so much!
